cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port to an out-of-range value 70000 will cause socket binding failure and prevent the CU from establishing connections.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of transmit antennas to zero will cause radio unit configuration errors and disable transmission capabilities in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將發送天線數量設定為零會導致無線單元配置錯誤，並在 DU 中禁用發送功能。
